wikipedia_page.main: Sir Thomas Theophilus Metcalfe, 1st Baronet (8 January 1745 – 17 November 1813) was a British soldier and politician.

response: *Sir Thomas Metcalfe, 1st Baronet (1745–1813), Director of the East India Company, MP for Abingdon
He defeated Sir Thomas Metcalfe, 1st Baronet for the Abingdon seat in the 1807 election, winning by a margin of seven.
